response.explain: In order to start cooking the brisket, we first need to take it out of the fridge. As no errors or previous code was given, and we don't currently have a brisket in our inventory, we will need to move to the fridge, open it, and then take the brisket.
response.subtask:
(1) Move robot to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Grasp the brisket from inside the fridge
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    fridge = registry(env, "fridge_dszchb_0")
    brisket = registry(env, "brisket_189")
    MoveBot(env, robot, fridge, camera)
    donothing(env)
    open(robot, fridge)
    donothing(env)
    EasyGrasp(robot, brisket)
